content: Without a doubt, every generation feels like they're destined to rebuild the world. Nevertheless, mine knows that it won't rebuild it. But its role is probably greater; it involves preventing the world from destroying itself.
translations: ita:Senza dubbio, ogni generazione si sente come se fosse destinata a ricostruire il mondo. Tuttavia, la mia sa che non lo r
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by DJ_Saidez (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
